member.name: T:MhLabs.AwsSignedHttpClient.Credentials.AwsCredentials
member.summary: Encapsulates AWS credentials needed for request signing.

member.name: P:MhLabs.AwsSignedHttpClient.Credentials.AwsCredentials.AccessKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the AWS access key. Required.

member.name: P:MhLabs.AwsSignedHttpClient.Credentials.AwsCredentials.SecretKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the AWS secret key. e.g. wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG+bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY Required.

member.name: P:MhLabs.AwsSignedHttpClient.Credentials.AwsCredentials.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets the security token.
